list.name: Default
list.comment: Added persistence for settings. Broke UserSettings into its own class. -Using Java Preferences API -Some naming standardisations, starting with a capital, renaming.

task.summary: Default task
Refactored code
Removed unnecessary bin folder
Added .jar
Fixed a bug (a typo) that was preventing the app from starting sometimes
Split the WeatherView class down into the classes that compose it for improved modularilty and readability.
Removed debugging results logging, updated the .jar file to the latest version
-Split the WeatherScreen into its own separate class. -Switched to a platform-dependent look-and-feel -Removed unnecessary imports
Added a JComboBox to allow users to browse available cities while searching
Code style standardisation. 4-space indentations!
Ugly fix to ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException occurring in WeatherAPI: try again until it works.
Fixed the fix to the API bug.
Updated WeatherAPI implementation to remove unnecessary object creations, improving performance.
Began to alter the UI to incorporate animated gifs in the background
Provided a more logical interface for interacting with the WeekDays class. Cleaned up some of the code, using loops, removing comments.
Added one additional attempt to connect to the Yahoo Weather API before closing
Fixed small visual bug on start-up, introduced some colours back into menu bars.
Specified encoding to be used for the project.
Introduced an animated background gif, fixed bug which caused the wrong weather to be displayed for the week.
Split the bottom panel into its own separate class
Fixed a bug in path for images in the weatherScreen
Introduced an animated background gif, fixed bug which caused the wrong weather to be displayed for the week.
Introduced an animated background gif, fixed bug which caused the wrong weather to be displayed for the week.
Split settings screen into its own class, provided hooks for action listeners
Fixed the functionality to retry the Yahoo weather API once before closing

Added a textfield in settings to select default location. Cleaned up API, tightened access control a bit. -Fixed a small bug in Proposal screen, where the last button had no listener. Made background colour solid, to prevent visual glitches.
Made the search bar take up the width of the screen on WeatherScreen
Added persistence for settings. Broke UserSettings into its own class. -Using Java Preferences API -Some naming standardisations, starting with a capital, renaming.
Added persistence for settings. Broke UserSettings into its own class. -Using Java Preferences API -Some naming standardisations, starting with a capital, renaming.
Using Observer design pattern in the weatherScreen. Multithreaded model updates when connecting to Yahoo WeatherAPI, so the app does not freeze
Incorporated the Observer design pattern more fully. Cleaned up the API for many classes, making them more generalisable. Restricted variable visibility when possible
Cleaned up API interactions. Solidified Observer interactions, took logic out of controller.
Added support for jpg images for weather types other than rain, and fixed repainting the background
Changed background to white
Added a scheduled refresh of the weather data once every hour.
Mades updates twice as frequent (every 30 mins)

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Mades updates twice as frequent (every 30 mins)
